verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord You are good And Your mercy endureth forever (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}People from every nation and tongue From generation to generation{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We worship You Hallelujah Hallelujah We worship You for who You are We worship You Hallelujah Hallelujah We worship You for who You are You are good!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are good all the time, all the time You are good!{/lang-eng}
